divs: Sighting Detailsi was in the car with my mom and my sister on the highway near my home town. i was listening to my red ipod and i looked toward the trees on my left side and saw a helicopter go by. i looked at it and then went back to the trees and saw what looked like and black oval shaped ship with a black rudder shape object in the back and it was just hovering there.i was so confused at fist and then i realised i amm seeing a UFO. i blinked to make sure i wasnt seeing anything and when i opened my eyes it was still there. i looked away and as soon as i looked away i saw a black speck (which i am guessing was the UFO) zoom away out of the corner of my eye. the next about 5 min. i saw it again in the same spot and this time my sister saw it but she is older and said it was just a plane. which i know it is not. and after it stayed there for a couple more min. i just stopped looking at it and went back to my ipod.
trends: There have been 13 other sightings in Canton
There were no other sightings in Canton on or around March 30th 2010
Summary: An oval with a parallel rudder in the back.
